actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of investigations and studies authorized by the Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of $2,209,424 by the House Committee on Public Works and Transportation for inquiries and investigations. Allocates $70,000 to be expended for the procurement of consultant services. Requires the chairman of the Committee to furnish the Committee on House Administration information with respect to any study or investigation intended to be financed from such funds.

titles.title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of investigations and studies authorized by the Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
